From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

Sorry I haven't been on lately, you guys know how all bad things are said to
come in threes? well nuff said.

As we recall the brave young fox was trapped by the dubious Predacons.

Foxfingers stood up after the drones released him and dusted himself off. He
had a few tricks left but decided to hold them in case of emergency. at the
moment he was in desperate need of a silver tounge and a lot of luck. "We
were sent to retrieve a bot named Silver Scout." the quickest answers were
to tell the truth so he smiled a political smile and continued. "The bot
that was with me and I were outside the base when your group over reacted
and sunk it. The choice was to either get barbacued or break in so we sort
of cut a hole and broke in." He knew that only two things could get him out
of this mess. A stroke of genius or a gamblers luck were required to get his
tail out of this one. The thief knew that genius was out of the question so
he prayed for luck. "We meant no agression we just wanted our bot back."

The fox had other things going through his mind as well. The Predacons might
not be very happy about having thier DNA duplicated without thier permition.
He thought about the odds that the Preds hadn't scanned Silver Scouts DNA
but the way the day was going he knew that there was only a snowballs chance
in the inferno that they hadn't. He knew that they knew that the wolf DNA
was duplicated and that his arrival pointed a finger at exactly how the DNA
was obtained. Now his biggest problem was how to use that to his advantage.
----- Original Message -----
From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>
To: Neo Beast Wars RPG <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, September 18, 2001 4:12 AM
Subject: Interrogation
